document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) of Serbia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) of Serbia

183 .
Dorcadion ( Carinatodorcadion ) aethiops aethiops (Scopoli, 1763 )

Examined material. Totally
279 specimens
from the following locations: South Banat D, Vršačko Brdo Hill; City of Belgrade D, Grocka; City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Košutnjak Park; City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Miljakovac; City of Belgrade D, Mt. Avala, Čarapićev Brest; City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, village of Trešnja (
Ćurčić et al . 2003
;
Ilić 2005
). The new findings include: 8 S, City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Vidikovac,
02– 31 .V. 2005
, NI; 3 S, idem ,
21 .IV– 18 .V. 2009
, NI; 3 S, idem ,
17 .IV– 30 .V. 2011
, NI; 1 S, idem ,
23 .IV– 19 .V. 2012

28 .IV– 19 .V. 2013
, NI; 17 S, idem ,
08.IV–07.V. 2014
, NI; 2 S, idem ,
22 .
IV. 2015

20 .V. 2009
, NI; 1 M, 1 F, Zaječar D, Mt. Rtanj, village of Rtanj,
05.
VI. 2010
, NI; 2 F, idem ,
03.
VI. 2012
, NI; 1 M, 1 F, Bor D, Tekija,
05.
VI. 2010
, NI; 2 F, idem ,
21 .VI. 2011
, NI; 2 S, South Banat D, Vršačko Brdo Hill,
21 .V. 2011

03.VIII. 2012
, MM; 2 S, Braničevo D, Petrovac na Mlavi, village of Melnica,
11 .V. 2013
, NI (
Ilić 2005
; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Distribution. Central Europe, Ukraine , Balkan Peninsula.
Remarks. Found in higher amounts between turfs in meadows during warm and sunny spring days.

* 184 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) lineatocolle Kraatz, 1873
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Balkan Peninsula.

Distribution in Serbia .
Serbia , without precise locality ( 7 ; 46 ).

Remarks.
Breuning ( 1962 )
,
Mikšić & Korpič ( 1985 )
, and
Danilevsky ( 2015 )
reported it for Serbia , but without any additional data on the precise finding. No other data available from the literature exist regarding the presence in the country. The finding is doubtful, although the taxon is recorded in some other Balkan countries (
Adamović 1965
;
Ilić 2005
).

185 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) pedestre pedestre (Poda, 1761 )

Examined material. Totally
339 specimens
collected at the following sites: City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Košutnjak Park; City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Miljakovac; Pomoravlje D, Kučajske Planine Mts., Babina Glava ; Pomoravlje D, Mt. Beljanica, village of Sladaja; South Banat D, Vršačko Brdo Hill; Zaječar D, Soko Banja; Bor D, Tekija; Toplica D, Blace; Zaječar D, Mt. Rtanj, village of Rtanj; Prizren D, Mt. Šar Planina, Brezovica; Braničevo D, Homoljske Planine Mts., village of Ceremošnja; Bor D, Donji Milanovac; City of Belgrade D, Mt. Avala; Mačva D, Mt. Cer, mountain house; Kolubara D, Mt. Povlen, village of Donji Taor, 950 m a.s.l.; City of Belgrade D, Barajevo, Guberevac Forest; Braničevo D, Žagubica; South Banat D, Kovin; Zlatibor D, Mt. Zlatibor; Srem D, Nova Pazova (
Ćurčić et al . 2003
;
Ilić 2005
; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Distribution. Central Europe, Ukraine , Balkan Peninsula.
Remarks. Frequently found in warm sunny grasslands, especially during warm spring days.

186 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) ljubetense ljubetense Pic, 1909
(
Fig. 22
)

Examined material. 1 S, Prizren D, Mt. Šar Planina, Brezovica, Velika Livada, 2,100 m a.s.l.,
11 .VI. 1997
, NI (CNI) (
Ilić 2005
).
Distribution. Republic of Macedonia , Albania , Serbia .

187 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) kaimakcalanum Jureček, 1929
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Republic of Macedonia , Greece , Serbia .

Distribution in Serbia .
S ( 47 ).

* 188 a.
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) arenarium rubrimembris Pic, 1917
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Balkan Peninsula.

Distribution in Serbia .
Serbia , without precise locality ( 3 ).

Remarks.
Althoff & Danilevsky ( 1997 )
reported it for Serbia , but without any additional data on the precise finding. Later,
Danilevsky ( 2015 )
didn’t mention the presence in Serbia . No other data available from the literature exist regarding the presence in the country. This finding is suspicious, although the taxon is recorded in some other Balkan countries (
Mikšić & Korpič 1985
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
* 188 b.
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) arenarium hypsophilum Müller, 1905
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Balkan Peninsula.

Distribution in Serbia .
Serbia , without precise locality ( 3 ). Remarks.
Althoff & Danilevsky ( 1997 )
reported it for Serbia , but without any additional data on the precise finding. Later,
Danilevsky ( 2015 )
didn’t mention the presence in Serbia . No other data available from the literature exist regarding the presence in the country. This finding is suspicious, although the taxon is recorded in some other Balkan countries (
Mikšić & Korpič 1985
).

* 189 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) tauricum tauricum Waltl, 1838
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Balkan Peninsula, Ukraine .

Distribution in Serbia .
Serbia , without precise locality ( 7 ; 46 ).

Remarks.
Breuning ( 1962 )
,
Mikšić & Korpič ( 1985 )
, and
Danilevsky ( 2015 )
reported it for Serbia , but without any additional data on the precise finding. No other data available from the literature exist regarding the presence in the country. The finding is suspicious, although the taxon is recorded in some other Balkan countries (
Danilevsky 2015
).

190 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) decipiens (Germar, 1824 )
(
Fig. 23
)

Examined material. 1 F, Zaječar D, Mt. Rtanj, village of Rtanj,
03.
VI. 2012
, NI (CNI); 7 S, idem ,
06.VI. 2014
, NI (CNI) (Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; this paper).
Distribution. Hungary , Slovakia , Moldova , Romania , Serbia , Montenegro , Ukraine .

Distribution in Serbia .
N (V) and E ( 2 ; 22 ; 27 ; 46 ; this paper).
Remarks. Rarely found in the country so far. Known just from three sites in Serbia (Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; this paper).

subSubSection.paragraph:
191 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) murrayi Küster, 1847
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Romania , Hungary , Serbia .

Distribution in Serbia .
E ( 21 ; 46 ).

Remarks. Rare species in the country. Known just from one location in Serbia (Kladovo) (
Ilić 2005
).
Mikšić & Korpič ( 1985 )
mentioned that it might be present in the Vojvodina Province (Northern Serbia ) as well.

192 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) equestre reclinatum Kraatz, 1892
Examined material. None.
Distribution. Balkan Peninsula.
Remarks. With insufficient data on the subspecies occurrence in the country.

193 .
Dorcadion ( Cribridorcadion ) scopolii (Herbst, 1784 )
(
Fig. 24
)

Examined material. Totally
470 specimens
collected at the following sites: City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Košutnjak Park; City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Miljakovac; Pomoravlje D, Svilajnac, Baćica Hill; Zaječar D, Soko Banja; South Banat D, Deliblato Sands, Devojački Bunar; South Banat D, Deliblato Sands, Šumarak; Bor D, Tekija; Zaječar D, Mt Rtanj, village of Rtanj; City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Vidikovac; Nišava D, Niš; City of Belgrade D, Lazarevac, village of Vrbovno; Srem D, Nova Pazova (CNI) (
Ćurčić et al . 2003
;
Ilić 2005
; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Distribution. Slovakia , Hungary , Romania , Bulgaria , Serbia .
Remarks. Present in larger amounts on pathways and grass in warm and sunny meadows and is easily collected.
